alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 10:39AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cleveland, southeastern Dallas, southwestern Jefferson and west central Lincoln Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1039 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tipton, or 8 miles east of Fordyce, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Star City... Rison... Kingsland... Feenyville... Mt Elba... Tipton... Marks Mill State Park... Hebron... Toledo... Kedron... Cane Creek State Park... Sulphur Springs... Glendale in Lincoln County... Rowell... Faith... Pinebergen... Palmyra... Calmer... Mt Zion... New Edinburg... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
